name: Dalek War - War Game
description:
Dalek war is a tank game inside the Doctor Who Universe.The concept is taken from Doctor Who where all Daleks hate the Doctor who and try to kill him. This game can have  1 to 4 players and includes 3 levels named Tranquil,Arduous, and Perilous. Players one and only mission is to kill all the enemies and reach Doctor Who in the final round (Perilous) and kill him and be the leader.This game has the modified physics and the ability to move the tanks.

Movements:

Player 1

Right: ▶ (Right Arrow) use right arrow to button move right

Left: ◀ (Left Arrow) use left arrow button to move left

Top:  ▲(Up Arrow) use Up arrow button to move upwards

Down:▼(Down Arrow) use Down arrow button to move Downwards

Fire: CTRL use control button to fire

Player 2: W up A left S down D right Fire: left control

Player 3: U up j down H left K Right,  L Fire,

Player 4: 8 up  4 left 2 down 6 right 0 Fire
